about_the_game:
Aw, I love Bańka! She's just the happiest little bundle of joy I ever laid my eyes on! She brings smiles to everyone, as far as I'm concerned, she can stay.

ABOUT BAŃKA

Age: 0? 1?
Height: Dynamic (but usually 169cm)
Blood: ...PVAC+Borax?
Bust size: Dynamic (but usually G)
Origin: Cosmetics Factory in Colorado Springs
Interests: The world and everyone in it

Bańka was to be a bodyguard, but you stopped the program being loaded in at the last second, so instead, now she is a bubbly bundle of joy, happiness and vaguely excited gurgling sounds... And we wouldn't want her any other way.

WHAT YOU'RE GETTING


This DLC unlocks the legendary champion - Bańka, with 120 trust, enough to immediately reach level 10.

You will also receive an epic equipment set, allowing you to use her in missions immediately, along with a legendary look for Bańka (or its equivalent in nanites if you already have it).

And of course, by purchasing this DLC, you are supporting us. Thank you!

This DLC is non-refundable after activation.

content_descriptors.notes:
This Game contains content not appropriate for all ages, and is not appropriate for viewing at work: Nudity or Sexual Content, General Mature Content, some references to Substance/Alcohol Abuse.

All characters depicted are over the age of 18.

Mature content in this game includes:
- Blowjobs, Handjobs, and Sex
- Polyamory, Group Sex and Orgies
- Lesbian Sex
- Android Sex
- Consensual BDSM and bondage
- Punishment and instances of non-consensual sexual activities
